00059   int checkInstruction(){

00061     int t =0; // store the variable here for now
00062     t = variable[0] << 8;
00063     t |= variable[1];

00069       result += (actionID >> i) &0x01;

00071

00089   int  readIncoming(){//if a new instruction is generated, return a 1
